title: How We Show Up

questions.text: When you've had a rough day, the first thing I want to do is...
choices: Try to cheer you up or distract you
Give you space until you're ready to talk

questions.text: A small gesture from you that always makes my day better is...
choices: A random sweet text or message
Making me coffee or bringing me something
Physical affection - a hug or kiss

questions.text: When we're apart for a while, I find myself...
choices: Texting you little updates throughout the day
Saving up stories to share when we're together
Missing your presence but enjoying solo time too
Counting down until I see you again

questions.text: I know you're really listening to me when you...
choices: Put down your phone and make eye contact
Just sit with me without trying to fix things

questions.text: Something I hope we never stop doing together is...

description: Discover the small ways you show up for each other every day.
